Corona.KWRM:
KWRM (1370 AM, G & E Studio) is a radio station that broadcasts a Chinese ethnic format by simulcasting on Meruelo Group's 105.9 KPWR HD2 Los Angeles subchannel . KWRM is licensed to Los Angeles, California


== History ==
Most of KWRM's programming is in Chinese and Spanish. However, there are some English-language shows, especially sports events and talk shows.
